parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
Resources 
| where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces" 
| order by name 
| project id, name, selected=row_number()==1, group=resourceGroup
parameters.label: üóÇÔ∏è Workspace

parameters.name: Top
parameters.label: Show Top locations
parameters.description: Only show this amount of locations om the map

content.json:
#### Tab One. Malicious IP  
This report can get data from a number of sources (six are defined in this release) to show the distance from the Malicious IP addresses to a selected users default location.  
You may see an error if one or more data sources are missing.  There will be no entries if *all* sources are missing - there is a warning dialog box displayed if this happens.
This is a similar view to the one shown on the Summary page of Azure Sentinel, but this is showing distance data as well.
There are three options to aid filtering:
1. Select a Location from a list (for that you will have to edit this workbook and amend the "CityList" parameter if you require changes to the capital cities I have provided).  Please save the JSON of any co-ordinates you add, as you will need to add them back if you ever update the workbook to a newer version.  This is useful if you have some office locations or important places  that you wish to add.
2. Select from Microsoft Entra ID (Entra ID), if the SigninLogs table exists, this will populate from the latest record, a entry per City /( Country ) with Longitude and Latitude data.
3. Enter a Latitude and Longitude of your choice, and a label to describe the location. 
You may also select to show the data in Kilometers (KM) or Miles.  You can also set how many locations to show, 5, 10, 20 etc...
4. Use a Watchlist.  Create a Watchlist.  The csv file, needs a row with three columns Long, Lat, City  (City will be the searchkey).  You must set the Watchlist Alias to **userMapCityList**

|Long|Lat|City|
|---|---|---|
|51.507351	|-0.127758	|London|
|48.856613	|2.352222	|Paris|
| etc...


Datasources: WireData, VMconnection, CommonSecurityLog, WindowsFirewall, W3CIISLog and DnsEvents 
			 Note: SigninLogs is required to build the Entra ID list, if you dont have this critical datasource, please use options #1 or #3.

#### Tab two. Locations and distances (User Data)
Information using Microsoft Entra ID (Entra ID) Signinlogs data, this shows user Signin Locations and distance between as well as order visited (you select a User from dropdown options, ordered by their signin count).  

Datasources:SigninLogs

#### Tab three. Microsoft WAF 
Show Azure Front door and Application Gateway Web Application Firewall 

Datasources: AzureDiagnostics

### Change Log
|Version|Description|
|---|---|
|v1.0	|Initial Version|
|V1.1.0	|Updated from 2019 version, combining new features and improving the look and feel. | 
|V1.1.1	|Updated chart to display Location, Latitude, Longitude when a region is clicked|  
|V1.2	|Added info when you select a region on the 'Map showing locations for User', fixed a time display message.  Added dwell time (the time delay between the entries), in the "looking for" grid to augment the distance travelled.|
|V1.3| Add support for a drop down warning, and UserMap user selection options (user by count, User by first Letter & free text search) |
|V1.4	| Add GeoLocation api from Microsoft.  Add a watchlist alias == userMapCityList|

parameters.name: getLocation
parameters.label: Location selector

parameters.name: CityList
parameters.label: Location - custom list
parameters.description: Edit this parameter to provide your own locations - please see Help

parameters.name: CityListAAD
parameters.label: Location - obtained from Entra ID
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| extend city_      = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude) 
| summarize count(), arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by city_
| where isnotempty(city_)
| distinct city_ , count_, latitude_, longitude_, Location
| extend city_ = strcat(city_," (", Location ,")")
| project label = strcat(city_,",",latitude_,",",longitude_), value = city_
| order by label asc

parameters.name: watchlistSubscription
parameters.label: ‚òÅÔ∏è WatchList Sub
parameters.description: Alternate Subscription/Workspace if the watchlist is centrally stored

parameters.name: watchlistWorkspace
parameters.label: üóÇÔ∏è watchlist Workspace
parameters.query:
Resources 
| where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces" 
| order by name 
| project id, name, selected=row_number()==1, group=resourceGroup

parameters.name: watchList
parameters.label: watchList City
parameters.description: Watchlist alias: userMapCityList required, please see Help

content.json:
### Please select a Location, or confirm data source: SigninLogs exists
	if there are no values you may not have the [SigninLogs] table in this workspace.
Please use a Location Selection of:

	From a List
or

	Add a manual entry
or

	From a Watchlist called userMapCityList

parameters.name: defaultLocationName
parameters.description: Add a name for your custom Latitude/Longitude

parameters.name: locationName

content.title: Top: '{Top}' Malicious IP distances from {locationName} in ('{Measurement}')
Please select a map region for more details
content.noDataMessage: Please click on a map region

content.query:
// Show a summary of the map data 
union isfuzzy=true 
(W3CIISLog
| extend TrafficDirection = "InboundOrUnknown", Country=RemoteIPCountry, Latitude=RemoteIPLatitude, Longitude=RemoteIPLongitude), 
(DnsEvents
| extend TrafficDirection = "InboundOrUnknown", Country= RemoteIPCountry, Latitude = RemoteIPLatitude, Longitude = RemoteIPLongitude),
(WireData
| extend TrafficDirection = iff(Direction != "Outbound","InboundOrUnknown", "Outbound"), Country=RemoteIPCountry, Latitude=RemoteIPLatitude, Longitude=RemoteIPLongitude), 
(WindowsFirewall
| extend TrafficDirection = iff(CommunicationDirection != "SEND","InboundOrUnknown", "Outbound"), Country=MaliciousIPCountry, Latitude=MaliciousIPLatitude, Longitude=MaliciousIPLongitude), 
(CommonSecurityLog
| extend TrafficDirection = iff(CommunicationDirection != "Outbound","InboundOrUnknown", "Outbound"), Country=MaliciousIPCountry, Latitude=MaliciousIPLatitude, Longitude=MaliciousIPLongitude, Confidence=ThreatDescription, Description=ThreatDescription), 
(VMConnection
| where Type == "VMConnection"
| extend TrafficDirection = iff(Direction != "outbound","InboundOrUnknown", "Outbound"), Country=RemoteCountry, Latitude=RemoteLatitude, Longitude=RemoteLongitude)
// Start of main logic
// Supply a default location (long/lat)
| extend myLatitude = case( 
                            '{getLocation}' == 'mylist', todouble(split('{CityList:value}',",").[0]),
                            '{getLocation}' == 'aad' ,   todouble(split('{defaultCityListAAD:value}',",").[1]),
                            '{getLocation}' == 'manual', todouble({Latitude}),
                            //else
                            todouble(0)
                           )
| extend myLongitude = case( 
                            '{getLocation}' == 'mylist', todouble(split('{CityList:value}',",").[1]),
                            '{getLocation}' == 'aad' ,   todouble(split('{defaultCityListAAD:value}',",").[2]),
                            '{getLocation}' == 'manual', todouble({Longitude}),
                            //else
                            todouble(0)
                           )                         
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIP) and isnotempty(Country) and isnotempty(Latitude) and isnotempty(Longitude)
// measure the distance between the base/city and maliciousIP location in km or miles
| extend distance_in = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", geo_distance_2points(Longitude, Latitude, myLongitude, myLatitude)/1000.00, geo_distance_2points(Longitude, Latitude, myLongitude, myLatitude)/1609.344 )
| summarize count(), arg_max(TimeGenerated,TimeGenerated) by Country, 
                     distance_in,Latitude, Longitude,  toggle='{getLocation}', myLatitude, myLongitude
| top {Top} by count_
| order by distance_in desc
content.title: Top: '{Top}' Malicious IP distances from {locationName} in ('{Measurement}')

parameters.name: Select
parameters.label: Select Users method

parameters.name: SelectUserName
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange:query}
| where isnotempty(UserDisplayName) and  UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName
| order by Count desc, UserDisplayName asc
| project Value = UserDisplayName, Label = strcat(UserDisplayName, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins'), Selected = false

parameters.name: userCount
parameters.label: How many unique Users?
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where isnotempty(UserDisplayName) and  UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| distinct UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = strcat(count()," of 1000")

parameters.name: UserFilter
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| distinct UserDisplayName
| project  Alpha = toupper(substring(UserDisplayName,0,1))
| summarize Count = count() by Alpha
| order by Alpha asc
| project Value=Alpha, Label=Alpha, selected = false

parameters.name: SelectUserLetter
parameters.label: Select User Letter
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName startswith '{UserFilter:label}'
| summarize by UserDisplayName
| order by UserDisplayName asc

parameters.name: selectedUserCount
parameters.label: How many unique Users?
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName startswith '{UserFilter:label}'
| distinct UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = strcat(count()," of 1000")

parameters.name: SelectUserFree
parameters.label: Search for a User here
parameters.description: Enter a free text search for a User Name

parameters.name: SelectUserwithin
parameters.label: Matched User(s)
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName contains '{SelectUserFree}'
| distinct UserDisplayName
| project UserDisplayName 
| order by UserDisplayName asc

parameters.name: selectedUserCount2
parameters.label: How many unique Users?
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName contains '{SelectUserFree}'
| distinct UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = strcat(count()," of 1000")

parameters.name: SelectUser
parameters.description: Only shows user from name or letter parameter - depending on Toggle
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| extend SelectUser = case( '{Select}' == "name"   , '{SelectUserName}',
                            '{Select}' == "letter" , '{SelectUserLetter}',
                            '{Select}' == "free"   , '{SelectUserwithin}',
                            // else
                            "error"
                            )
| limit 1
| project SelectUser

content.json:
### Missing Input data Warning: diagnostics

User Name displayed, from the selected parameter: 
## {SelectUser}

|Parameter|Value detected|
|---|---|
|Name|{SelectUserName}|
|Letter|{SelectUserLetter}|
|Free|{SelectUserFree}|

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(row_number() > 1,tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),"FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = distance_in,
                       distanceTravelled2 = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}'),
                       latitude_,
                       longitude_
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: Map showing locations for user: '{SelectUser}'
Please select a map region for more details

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(row_number() > 1,tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),strcat("FirstLocation",' ','({Measurement})') ) 
| extend dwell_in = datetime_diff("second",TimeGenerated, prev(TimeGenerated))
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by TimeGenerated,
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       State = state_,
                       Location=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceBetweenLocations = distance_in, // strcat(distance_in,' ','({Measurement})')
                       dwell_in, IPAddress, IsRisky, ResourceGroup, AppDisplayName, ClientAppUsed, AuthenticationRequirement, ConditionalAccessStatus
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitOrder asc
content.title: Looking for '{SelectUser}' - click a row for more IP detail
üñß Lookup IP Address: {ipAddress} from Microsoft geoLocation api

content.query:
let IP_Data = external_data(network:string,geoname_id:long,continent_code:string,continent_name:string ,country_iso_code:string,country_name:string,is_anonymous_proxy:bool,is_satellite_provider:bool)
    ['https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/geoip2-ipv4/master/data/geoip2-ipv4.csv']
    with (ignoreFirstRecord=true, format="csv");
IP_Data
| evaluate ipv4_lookup(IP_Data, '{ipAddress}', network)
| summarize arg_max(network,*) by '{ipAddress}'
| extend IPaddress = '{ipAddress}'
| project-away *1
| project-reorder IPaddress
content.title: üñß  Lookup IP Address: {ipAddress} from GeoIP2

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(isnotempty(pLat),tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),"FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}')
//| top {Top} by City
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: '{SelectUser}' : Cities visitied

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(isnotempty(pLat),tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),"FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}')
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: '{SelectUser}' : distance travelled

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(isnotempty(pLat),tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),"FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}')
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: '{SelectUser}' : Countries visitied

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_ 
| order by count_ desc
content.title: All Users : Countries by most frequent

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "FRONTDOORS" and Category == "FrontdoorWebApplicationFirewallLog"
| summarize dcount(Resource), dcount(clientIP_s), dcount(clientPort_d)  by Resource
content.title: Front door
Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF) Logs

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK" and Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| distinct Resource
| summarize dcount(Resource) by Resource
content.title: Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF) Logs
